description:
PlayStation is reportedly planning a live stream, either a State of Play or a showcase, for September.

According to Giant Bomb's Jeff Grubb, who shared the information during Game Mess Mornings, PlayStation is planning on having a live stream during September. While Grubb said it will most likely be a State of Play and not a showcase, with the latter having a longer run time and more games featured, but he did not rule out a showcase as a possibility.

Grubb did not discuss any games he had specifically heard would be featured during the live stream, however the information came up during a discussion about Fairgames, one of PlayStation's in development live-service games. Grubb said he did not expect Fairgames to make an appearance during
title: PlayStation Reportedly Planning A Live Stream For September

description: Not all games will land the same in all cultures across the world, and Steam is making a small change to review scores to reflect that. When accessing games with enough scores in your client's selected language, you'll see a separate score for that language alongside other metrics.
title: Steam Is Tweaking Reviews To Make Them More Relevant

description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 has been only available on PC and Mac since its release in 2013, while American Truck Simulator has been parked on the same platforms since 2016. Euro Truck Simulator 2 has remained popular on Steam in that time despite its age. Now, both games are heading to to PS5 and Xbox Series X|S.

PlayStation Network has listed pages for Euro Truck Simulator 2 and American Truck Simulator, while Xbox added the former and the latter shortly thereafter. Specific release dates have yet to be disclosed.

description:
Marvel Rivals could get original characters in the future, in addition to its roster of comic book heroes.

In an interview with MP1st, Marvel Rivals creative director Guanguang was asked about the appearance of original characters in the MCU movies and television shows and if NetEase could create an original character for Marvel Rivals. Guanguang confirmed that NetEase does have the go-ahead to create original characters, although when asked for additional information, he simply said, "stay tuned."

title: Marvel Rivals Could Have Original Characters In The Future

description:
The Battlefield 6 open beta has officially ended after two weekends of explosive action, and based on the number of concurrent players on Steam and the slew of reactions online, a lot of people took some time with Battlefield's next installment. One of the main concerns coming out of the beta involves players worried about the average size of multiplayer maps being smaller and more compact like those in the beta--but if recent datamines from the BF community are any indication, those fears appear to be unfounded.

Via
title: Much Larger Battlefield 6 Maps Revealed In Datamine, Including New Vehicles

description:
Guilty Gear Strive is one of the longest-running fighting games in the genre right now, with its fourth season of add-on content about to end and a new "2.0" patch coming in 2026. The last character of that fourth season is also a first for the franchise: Lucy from Cyberpunk: Edgerunners enters the fray as Guilty Gear's first-ever guest character on August 21, and we have an look at nine minutes of new gameplay featuring the mysterious netrunner.

Lucy's main weapon is her neon whip, the Monowire, which she can quickly throw out as a potent combo starter. She also has Sprint Attack, a fast low-sweeping move that can be chained into other moves depending on the buttons the player presses after a successful hit.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Cyberpunk's Lucy Hacks Into Guilty Gear Strive August 21, See New Gameplay Now

description: Get a glimpse of new Guilty Gear -Strive- gameplay featuring Lucy from Cyberpunk Edgerunners. Lucy is playable on August 21 as part of the Guilty Gear -Strive- Season Pass 4 character pack.
title: Guilty Gear Strive - 9 Minutes Of NEW Lucy Gameplay

description:
Despite not having an official release date yet, work continues on the upcoming Street Fighter movie, with fans finally getting their first "look" at Guile--played by WWE Champion Cody Rhodes. It also gives fans an idea of how true to the world of Street Fighter they're going with this time around.

The tease came via an Instagram story from comedian and actor Andrew Schulz, who plays Dan in the film. The image shows what appears to be Rhodes wearing Guile's classic camo fatigues and sporting the USAF Major's famously exaggerated blonde flat top. It's not much, but you see the edge of him, with his shadow on the ground teasing the hair. It's the first real visual nod to the iconic fighter, who was previously portrayed by Jean-Claude Van Damme in the 1994 Street Fighter film.
title: Cody Rhodes' Look As Guile In The Street Fighter Movie Gets An Unusual Reveal

description:
This year's Pokemon World Championships was packed full of announcements, including a reveal of a few new cards coming to the physical Trading Card Game. The Pokemon Company released a CG trailer showing off a bunch of Pokemon fighting each other before revealing a new Mega Evolved Pokemon card, Mega Charizard X EX, alongside a new card rarity.

This is a fire-type card with a whopping 360HP, and has the move Inferno X, which does a base damage of 90 points, and can be multiplied by however many fire energy cards you discard from across your Pokemon on the field.

The big reveal for any collectors out there is a new type of card rarity. These
title: The Pokemon TCG Is Getting A New Type Of Rare Mega Evolution Cards

description:
Although Pokemon battles have been traditionally fought between two Pokemon trainers, Pokemon Legends: Z-A is increasing the number with a new mode.

A new trailer introduces the Z-A Battle Club, a mode that pits up to four players in free-for-all battles. The trainer who defeats the most Pokemon in three minutes is crowned the winner.

The trailer is set in an arena in Lumiose City at nighttime and gives an idea of the different tactics players can have and how fortunes can quickly change within the time limit. Just like the core Pokemon Legends experience, battles take place in real-time, so there are power-up items around the aren
title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A Is Getting Four-Player Battles

description:
It was the Pokemon World Championships over the weekend, and with that means plenty of announcements. If you're a bit of a Pokemon TCG Pocket aficionado, then you'll probably be excited to hear that Mega Evolution will be coming to the mobile card-collecting game later this fall. The Pokemon Company shared a trailer announcing the news, where it also showed off three Mega Pokemon cards that will be available to pull whenever the set drops.

First up is the "ever-fluffy" Mega Altaria. This one is a psychic-type card with 190HP, and it has just one move, Mega Harmony, which does a minimum of 40 damage, and increases by 30 points for every benched Pokemon you have.
title: Pokemon TCG Pocket Is Getting Mega Evolutions This Fall, New Cards Revealed

description:
Pokemon's video game competitive scene has an onboarding problem.

It's had one since the birth of the Pokemon Video Game Championship (VGC for short) in 2008 due to hidden mechanics, tedious grinding, and some devious RNG. Now, almost two decades later, The Pokemon Company has the opportunity to make competitive Pokemon the most approachable it's ever been. Thanks to Pokemon Champions, a battle simulator akin to Pokemon Stadium coming to Switch and mobile, players will be able to quickly and efficiently train and battle Pokemon. Not only that, but at the Pokemon World Championship last weekend The Pokemon Company announced that it will be the official way to compete in 2026's Worlds.

This is huge.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Pokemon Champions Could Unlock The Best Part Of Pokemon For Everyone

description:
Inin Games and Yu Suzuki have announced Shenmue 3 Enhanced, an upgraded version of the 2019 game, with more to be revealed at Gamescom 2025 this week.

The new edition will be coming to PC, PS5, as well as releasing for the first time on Xbox Series X|S as well as Nintendo platforms, although the press release does not confirm whether this will be just Nintendo Switch 2 or also Nintendo Switch. It will be the first time the series has appeared on a Nintendo platform.

Shenmue 3 Enhanced features overhauled visuals, performance boosts, and quality-of-life updates, although no new gameplay content has been confirmed. The original release did however have three pieces of DLC, including an additional story quest.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Shenmue 3 Enhanced Announced And Coming To Xbox And Nintendo Consoles For The First Time

description:
Since the end of Season 2 of HBO's The Last of Us, Bella Ramsey has been trying to figure out a way to work together with former co-star Pedro Pascal again. The Emmy-nominated actor has found themselves with another Outstanding Lead Actress nomination, with Pascal also racking up another Outstanding Lead Actor nod, as well as the show getting a second Outstanding Drama Series nomination.

Speaking to Variety, Ramsey joked, "I think maybe like a heist movie where we're robbing a bank together."

Ramsey continued by saying the most common question they get is about Pascal. “It's, 'How is Pedro Pascal? Is he as nice as he seems?'" they shared. "That's mostly what people ask me, and the answer is, 'Yes.'" Ramsey also mentioned the
title: The Last Of Us' Bella Ramsey Wants To Make A Heist Movie With Pedro Pascal

description:
The Pokemon Company is making some big changes when it comes to the video game series' world championships. Over the weekend, the latest Worlds tournament took place in California, and as is usual for the event a number of announcements were made. The biggest one for the Pokemon Video Game Championships is that the upcoming pseudo-spin-off game Pokemon Champions will be the main game at next year's Pokemon World Championships. On top of that, the game was also finally confirmed to be releasing on Nintendo Switch 2.

A trailer announcing this news also revealed that Mega Evolution will feature in the "first set of regulations for Ranked Battles in Pokemon Champions." There was also a teaser for a new in-game device called the Omni Ring, which you can check out on Pokemon Champions' official website. This will seemingly let you rotate between Mega Evolutio
title: Pokemon Champions Will Be The Main VGC Game At The Pokemon World Championships In 2026

description:
With its two beta weekends over, it's going to be a long wait until Battlefield 6 releases in October. Fortunately, an all-new Road to Battlefield 6 event for Battlefield 2042 will bridge the gap, as it kicks off today and runs through October 7. Players can expect new content, including a free rewards pass that EA says will celebrate the legacy of the Battlefield series with new gear, a reimagining of the fan-favorite Iwo Jima map, and more.

EA added that the event will feature 20 exclusive rewards for Battlefield 6, and these can be unlocked in Battlefield 2042 ahead of its launch. Players can pick up the KFS2000 assault rifle and the Lynx sniper rifle, and for aerial warfare, the A10 Warthog and SU-25TM Frogfoot are being pulled out of the vault so that they can be put back into service.

Alongside the rewards--which harken back to previous Battlefield games, including Bad Company 2--there'll also be several
title: Big Battlefield 2042 Update Offers Free BF6 Rewards And Reprised Iwo Jima Map

description:
A Nintendo Direct has been scheduled for tomorrow--the third one in the past month--this time focusing on a single game: Kirby Air Riders. Much like how his Super Smash Bros. Ultimate presentations went, game director Masahiro Sakurai will be hosting this particular Direct.

According to the livestream's description, it will "provide an in-depth look at the upcoming Nintendo Switch 2 game," and will be roughly 45 minutes long, which is longer than both of the previous two Directs combined. It kicks off at 6 AM PT / 9 AM ET / 2 PM BST, and you'll be able to watch it on Nintendo's official YouTube channel.

Kirby Air Riders was announced back in April during a Nintendo Direct that revealed a bevy of Nintendo Switch 2 games, though a
title: Kirby Air Riders Nintendo Direct Coming Tuesday, Will Run A Whopping 45 Minutes

description:
Prime Video and Kilter Films have released the first-look images from the highly anticipated second season of Fallout, set to premiere this December exclusively on Prime Video. Filming of the series recently wrapped over the summer, and fans have been waiting for any new updates.

Picking up in the wake of Season 1's finale, Season 2 will follow the characters as they journey through the radioactive Mojave Wasteland to the iconic post-apocalyptic city of New Vegas. You can check out the photos below.
title: First Look At Fallout Season 2 Revealed In New Vegas Photos
